name: John KOCHIE, Petitioner, v. WORKMEN'S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (F.D.I.B.), Respondent
name_abbreviation: Kochie v. Workmen's Compensation Appeal Board

parties: John KOCHIE, Petitioner, v. WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (F.D.I.B.), Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 19th day of March, 1998, the petition for allowance of appeal is GRANTED; the order of the Commonwealth Court affirming the order of the Workmen’s Compensation Appeal Board is VACATED; and this matter is REMANDED to the Commonwealth Court for a recalculation of subrogation rights consistent with this court’s opinion in P & R Welding & Fabricating v. Workmen’s Compensation Appeal Board, 549 Pa. 490, 701 A.2d 560 (1997).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:
707 A.2d 224
John KOCHIE, Petitioner, v. WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (F.D.I.B.), Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 19, 1998.
